rules.description: D As Hyper Key: D+S to Left Option
D As Hyper Key: D+F to Left Command
D As Hyper Key: Vi Mode
D Hyper Key: Vi Visual Mode
Press left_command twice to send Ctrl+L (Focus Address Bar in Browser)

manipulators.description: to_delayed_action is set to 400ms in karabiner.json

rules.description: Post escape if caps is pressed alone, left_ctrl otherwise
Numeric Keypad Mode [Tab as trigger key]
Post left_ctrl when return_or_enter is hold.
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
